name: Ground Beef Casserole with Brown Rice
author: BIFAERIE79
summary: My mother used to make this ground beef casserole for my brother and I when we were kids. Very filling. Takes well to additions and alterations.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
1 cup shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir ground beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Mix ground beef, brown rice, peas, soup, milk, soy sauce, and garlic together in a large bowl
Cover the baking dish with a lid or foil
Bake in the preheated oven until heated through and bubbly, 15 to 20 minutes
